text:
This code works well under Tomcat 7 :

File sourceJar = Locator.getClassSource(getClass());

But under JBoss AS 7, it returns null.

This is due to Jboss returning vfs:/pathToFile/myClass.class instead of file:/...

The method Locator.getResourceSource is not handling vfs prefix.
creator: mleneveut@gmail.com

text: I don't have any idea how JBoss VFS works but guess simply assuming vfs: was the same as file: is way too naive.  Unless anybody who knows enough about JBoss VFS steps in and provides us with the necesary information I don't see how we can "fix" it.  TBH I'm not even sure there will be a way to create a proper File instance from a VFS URI at all.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
